articles.title: A three-room flat in Punggol fetched a record-high of $638,000
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르, 주택 관련 뉴스
📢 A three-room flat in Punggol fetched a record-high of $638,000
articles.content: A three-room flat in Punggol was just sold for a record-high of $638,000. (Photo: Samuel Isaac Chua/EdgeProp Singapore). A three-room HDB flat at 406C Northshore Drive was recently sold for $638,000 ($885 psf). The 721-sq ft flat is located on the 19th to 21st storey. Northshore Residences I comprises five residential blocks and features a total of 588 flats. Northshore Residences II is a larger project, comprising seven residential blocks with 814 flats. Both projects offer a mix of two-room to five-room flats. Source: EdgeProp LandLens (as at 18 July 2025). As the owner has just fulfilled their minimum...

articles.title: July 22 South Africa (Kenilworth) form analysis
articles.summary:
📰 기술 관련 뉴스
📢 July 22 South Africa (Kenilworth) form analysis
articles.content: (9) MOUNT AUGUSTUS ran a lovely race on June 12 at Kenilworth. He is improving with every start. Good each-way chance. (8) WORLD WARRIOR finished just over seven lengths behind Saudi Cat on June 17. (4) IKO IKO was a touch disappointing last time behind October Storm. He was one-paced late. Place claims on his best form. (5) TIME HONORED ran a much better race against decent young horses on June 12. (2) BATON ROUGE won very impressively at Kenilworth on June 17. Carries big weight of 64kg, but he should go very close again. (1) MELA STRENGTH finally cracks a decent draw. He will be running on strongly. (3) STATE CAPITOL ran super behind Midway on June 17. (4) NARETOI definitely ran a better race last time with blinkers and tongue tie on. Claims with step-up to 1,600m. (7) SESAME has improved over more ground. She will power home late, include her in all bets.

articles.title: Bukit Panjang LRT outage: Fault linked to newly installed power system, says SMRT
articles.summary:
📰 교통, 취업, 기술 관련 뉴스
📢 Bukit Panjang LRT outage: Fault linked to newly installed power system, says SMR...
articles.content: The power fault which crippled services across the Bukit Panjang LRT line twice in July have been linked to a newly installed power distribution system, said rail operator SMRT. In the second incident on Saturday (July 19), the disruption lasted for about two hours. On Saturday afternoon, a fault in the power distribution system halted train services across the line. Both incidents are linked to the newly installed Power SCADA system, which remotely monitors and controls power distribution across the Bukit Panjang LRT network

articles.title: Daily Debrief: What Happened Today (Jul 21)
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르, 비즈니스, 교통 관련 뉴스
📢 Daily Debrief: What Happened Today (Jul 21)
articles.content: MAS appoints first 3 asset managers to inject initial S$1.1 billion into Singapore equities. More than 100 global, regional and local asset managers have indicated their interest in the programme. It will consult on proposals later this year to strengthen investor protection through the enhancement of avenues to seek civil recourse. SIA, Singtel and more: Singapore’s top AI adopters could drive 3% GDP growth, says Morgan Stanley. IFAs account for 40.7% of the industry’s new business growth in 2024, outpacing tied agents, at 33.3%. All rights reserved.
